text: The Genting Snow Park will be located in Chongli District, Zhangjiakou city, Hebei Province. This venue will host the freestyle skiing and snowboarding events for the 2022 Winter Olympics. It has two venues called A and B. Each of them have a capacity of 7,500 spectators, with 5,000 fixed seats. Category:Venues of the 2022 Winter Olympics Category:Proposed sports venues in China Category:Sports venues in China Category:Zhangjiakou
title: Genting Snow Park
